profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building high-performance solutions leveraging **C#**, **Angular**, and **T-SQL** within service-oriented architectures. My technical expertise is underscored by a solid background in **Microservices** and **Cloud Computing** principles, enabling me to develop robust applications that meet industry standards for **IT Security** and compliance.
I bring an in-depth understanding of developing enterprise-grade platforms, integrating **AI** capabilities for predictive analytics and automation. My previous roles have involved effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams, utilizing strong **problem-solving** and **communication** skills to drive project success.
In addition to my technical proficiencies with **SQL Server**, I possess hands-on experience deploying solutions using **Azure** and **AWS**, affirming my capability in modern cloud environments. My dedication to continuous improvement and adherence to best practices ensure the delivery of secure, efficient, and scalable applications.
